TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowInstanceUnhandledExceptionRecord extends System.Activities.Tracking.WorkflowInstanceRecord
Public NotInheritable Class WorkflowInstanceUnhandledExceptionRecord Inherits WorkflowInstanceRecord

summary.span: 包含运行时跟踪基础结构在工作流实例遇到未经处理的异常时发送给跟踪参与者的数据。

span.span: Contains the data sent to a tracking participant by the run-time tracking infrastructure when a workflow instance encounters an unhandled exception.
Creates a new instance of the class.
